heading: soft pitches to cuba
subheading: the clinton administration is tiptoeing toward a slightly softer policy on cuba. among the new overtures: the us would permit the baltimore orioles to play a couple of games against the cuban national baseball team, one in the states and one on the island -- as long as the proceeds go to charity, not to the castro regime.
author: wired staff
text: the clinton administration is tiptoeing toward a slightly softer policy on cuba. among the new overtures: the us would permit the baltimore orioles to play a couple of games against the cuban national baseball team, one in the states and one on the island -- as long as the proceeds go to charity, not to the castro regime.
